name: Deepsense
content: Developed a distributed microservice backend architecture for video processing/analysis using AWS, Docker, Node.js, GRPC, Go and C++. Developed a Javascript SDK for client-side video capture/processing using WebAssembly.

name: OnePoint Australia
content: Developed a fitness club management web application (in React.js) for Evolution Wellness Holdings Pte. Ltd.

name: Zenly (Snap Inc.)
content: Provide tools and metrics on the app back-office (React.js, NodeJS). Developed the web version of the footprint feature (preact.js and WebGL).

name: DxO
content: Setup a automated testing system for the DxO One camera. Created & developed a Python framework around this system

name: Tiki Labs
content: Created a prototype for the tiki6keys touchscreen technology
